data.name: Amazon Prototype
data.description: Working Prototype of real Amazon application
data.dialogData:
Technology Stack:
  • Front-end: React.js, Redux
  • Back-end: Node.js, Express.js, Kafka MQ
  • Database: MongoDB, MySQL, Redis
  • Deployment: Amazon EC2
  • Testing: JUnit, Mocha
Personas
  • Customer
    • Create new profile
    • Save Cards and Address
    • Add to cart
    • Order and CheckOut
  • Seller
    • Manage Inventory and Prices
    • View Statistics
    • Accept Order
    • Update Tracking Status
  • Admin
    • Add/Remove Categories
    • View Analytics Dashboard

data.name: Handshake Prototype
data.description: Working Prototype of real Handshake application
data.dialogData:
Developed the code in 3 phases
Phase 1 Technology Stack:
  • Front-end: React.js, Redux
  • Back-end: Node.js, Express.js, Kafka MQ
  • Database: MongoDB, MySQL, Redis
  • Deployment: Amazon EC2
  • Testing: JUnit, Mocha
Personas
  • Customer
    • Create new profile
    • Save Cards and Address
    • Add to cart
    • Order and CheckOut
  • Seller
    • Manage Inventory and Prices
    • View Statistics
    • Accept Order
    • Update Tracking Status
  • Admin
    • Add/Remove Categories
    • View Analytics Dashboard

data.name: Healing Hearts
data.description: A common portal for donating and raising donations for NGOs
